[client]
host     = localhost
user     = debian-sys-maint
password = ARWluoO3DRPrnB6P
socket   = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock

host     = localhost
user     = debian-sys-maint
password = ARWluoO3DRPrnB6P
socket   = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
